review: It was great. He is patient enough to understand my problem and plan the treatment accordingly. No unnecessary medication unless required.

My mother visited the doctor for hand pain.Most of the doctors suggested to take the small surgery to set the nerves..but he suggested to use ice bag everyday and take the proper rest and it's worked well.I am happy with his treatment by providing simple solutions.

********* ** **** ***** My mother is happy with the treatment given by Dr Harinath
Knee pain has gone away, she has started doing all her work by herself. Happy to see her back on track. Thank you  Padmaja hospital team & sir.....
